phase_a.docs:
The group of exposed sensors for Phase A/1.
  * **current** (*Optional*): Use the current value of the sensor in amperes. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  * **voltage** (*Optional*): Use the voltage value of the sensor in volts. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [Havells Solar](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/havells_solar.html#configuration-variables)*

phase_b.docs:
The group of exposed sensors for Phase B/2 on applicable inverters.
  * All options from **phase_a**
  
  

*See also: [Havells Solar](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/havells_solar.html#configuration-variables)*

phase_c.docs:

pv1.docs:
The group of exposed sensors for Photo Voltaic 1.
  * **current** (*Optional*): Use the current value of the sensor in amperes. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  * **voltage** (*Optional*): Use the voltage value of the sensor in volts. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  * **active_power** (*Optional*): Use the (active) power value of the sensor in watts. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  * **voltage_sampled_by_secondary_cpu** (*Optional*): Use the photo voltiac’s voltage sampled by slave CPU value of the sensor in volts. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  * **insulation_of_p_to_ground** (*Optional*): Use the insulation of photo voltiac’s +ve terminal to ground value of the sensor in kilo ohms. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [Havells Solar](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/havells_solar.html#configuration-variables)*

pv2.docs:

update_interval.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.

*See also: [Havells Solar](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/havells_solar.html#configuration-variables)*

address.docs:
**int**: The address of the sensor if multiple sensors are attached to the same UART bus. You will need to set the address of each device manually. Defaults to `1`.

*See also: [Havells Solar](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/havells_solar.html#configuration-variables)*
